00039 #ifndef CARMEN_LASER_MESSAGES_H
00040 #define CARMEN_LASER_MESSAGES_H
00041 
00042 #ifdef __cplusplus
00043 extern "C" {
00044 #endif
00045 
00047   typedef enum {SICK_LMS = 0, 
00048                 SICK_PLS = 1, 
00049                 HOKUYO_URG = 2, 
00050                 SIMULATED_LASER = 3, 
00051                 UMKNOWN_PROXIMITY_SENSOR = 99}
00052   carmen_laser_laser_type_t;
00053   
00055   typedef enum {
00056     REMISSION_NONE       = 0, 
00057     REMISSION_DIRECT     = 1, 
00058     REMISSION_NORMALIZED = 2
00059   } carmen_laser_remission_type_t;
00060   
00062   typedef struct {
00063     carmen_laser_laser_type_t laser_type;   
00064     double start_angle;                     
00065     double fov;                             
00066     double angular_resolution;              
00067     double maximum_range;                   
00068     double accuracy;                        
00069     carmen_laser_remission_type_t remission_mode;  /* if and what kind of remission values are used */
00070     
00071   } carmen_laser_laser_config_t;
00072 
00073   
00075   typedef struct {
00076     int id;                                
00077     carmen_laser_laser_config_t config;    
00078     int num_readings;                      
00079     float *range;                          
00080     int num_remissions;                    
00081     float *remission;                      
00082     double timestamp;                      
00083     char *host;                            
00084   } carmen_laser_laser_message;
